titleStmt.title: A transcription of Galatians in L156
The New Testament
Das Neue Testament
The Epistle to the Galatians
Galatians

respStmt.name: The International Greek New Testament Project

titleStmt.funder: This transcription was made as part of the CATENA project, which has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no. 770816).

sponsor.name: The Institute for Textual Scholarship and Electronic Editing

publisher.name: The International Greek New Testament Project (IGNTP)

availability.p: Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) Available for re-use under a creative commons license provided attribution is made to the original creators.

projectDesc.p: This transcription was made by the International Greek New Testament Project in its work towards the Editio Critica Maior.

editorialDecl.p: This transcription was produced using the online transcription editor developed by the Center for Digital Humanities at the University of Trier as part of the Workspace for Collaborative Editing Project between 2010 and 2013 and made available for use by the Institute for Textual Scholarship and Electronic Editing and the University of Birmingham.
The XML specifications used are version 1.4 of the IGNTP Guidelines available at

ab.note: This lection is incorrectly ascribed to 2 Corinthians. We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W3D4.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W3D5.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W3D6.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W4D2.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W4D3.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W4D4.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W4D5.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W4D6.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W5D2.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W5D3.
We would normally expect to find this lection at S3W5D4.
This is the second part of the lection following 1 Corinthians.
